bibl.title: Chronological Systems of Christian Nubia.

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume

bibl.note: Revised version of a doctoral dissertation, Univ. of Warsaw, June 2010. - Preface. - Introduction. - Part One. Annual Dating Methods: Chapter One. The Era of Diocletian / the Martyrs; - Chapter Two. The Indiction System; - Chapter Three. The Era of the Saracens; - Chapter Four. The Christian Eras; - Chapter Five. Regnal Years. - Part Two. Calendrical Systems: Chapter Six. The Egyptian Calendar; - Chapter Seven. Lunar Calendar; - Chapter Eight. Liturgical Calendar; - Chapter Nine. Days of the Week. - Conclusion. - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: Ochała Grzegorz, Chronological Systems of Christian Nubia. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XVI.)
Warsaw, Warsaw University, 2011, 8°, xix-364 pp., 48 tabl., 9 cartes. ISBN 978-83-925919-5-5. $75.

Revised version of a doctoral dissertation, Univ. of Warsaw, June 2010. - Preface. - Introduction. - Part One. Annual Dating Methods: Chapter One. The Era of Diocletian / the Martyrs; - Chapter Two. The Egyptian Calendar; - Chapter Seven. Lunar Calendar; - Chapter Eight. Liturgical Calendar; - Chapter Nine. Days of the Week. - Conclusion. - Bibliography.
